revised_title: Mineralogy of Iron Meteorites: Progress and Classification
tldr: This article discusses the mineralogy of iron meteorites, comparing the state of research in 1876 to that of 1976. It presents the classification of iron meteorites based on chemical composition, including nickel and phosphorus content and trace elements. The author also proposes a 'fingerprint' for iron meteorites, combining structural specifications and bulk chemical analysis for better classification and understanding of these celestial objects.
